free: #e I will speak again. I am uncle Mu'u.
#c 我還要再說一遍，我是Mu'u叔叔。
#n 這裡發音人自稱cuma，如果是對祖孫輩則會使用tamu。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

free: #n 此處的pa應翻為still(‘還’)，而非’再次’的意思。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

free: #e To tell the truth, I have felt tired to talk about this.
#n kan等於老一輩使用的kani，涵義為:(1) 表轉述:據說;傳說;轉述自己的夢境(2) ‘其實’(3) 不確定時用

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

free: #e This, our professor asked me to say this again, which I have already said for three times.
#c 我們這位教授呢，讓我重複說了，我說了3次(三種話)。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

free: #e She made me say this again because that I am good at speaking.
#c 讓我再次說是因為據說我很會說話 (引用宋教授說的)。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu

free: #e I will say something about the millet which is the so-called siau mi in Chinese
#c 我要說關於小米的事,也就是外省人所說的小米。
#n Kanakanavu對台灣各族群與時代的稱呼
#n ’oria 平埔族(原指隔壁小林村的人)
#n tapcarake 矮人(相傳住在樹底下或在樹葉間穿梭的民俗傳說人物)

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu

free: #n mamarang需依上下文翻譯, 有時指長輩, 老人家, 或是祖先
#n mamarang需依上下文翻譯, 有時指長輩, 老人家, 或是祖先

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

free: #e Millet, our elders knew in the past time.
#c 小米,我們的長輩以前是知道。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu

free: #n mamia表示強調要注意(‘所要知道的就是…’)
#n mamia表示強調要注意(‘所要知道的就是…’)

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

free: #e So when we Kanakanavu are harvesting the millet, know that you little children.
#c 所以當我們Kanakanavu收割小米時,你們後代的小朋友們,要注意。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

free: #n 這裡的pa不是‘還’, 而是‘先’
#n 這裡的pa不是‘還’, 而是‘先’

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu

free: #e We have to worship first. We have to worship first, because…Why do we worship?
#c 要先給予祭祀。要先給予祭祀, 因為… 為什麼(因何)要祭祀呢?

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

gloss: 說-關係詞=長者=1PL.屬格.包含
free: #e It is because of what our elders said in the past time
#c (是)因為我們以前老人家所說的。

meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

free: #e If it is time to harvest the millet, fathers in heaven would had already known that these kanakanavu people were going to worship in the chamber.
#c 這個小米呢, 若要採收的時候, 天上的祖先就已經知道說這些Kanakancu人要在聚會所祭祀了。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

free: #e So if the time to harvest the millet has come, we have to call the name first.
#c 所以若要收割小米, 還要先說出名字。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

free: #e Oh! It’s not the so-called naming, but is to really worship.
#c 喔!不是所謂的命名,其實是真正的祭祀。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

free: #e We have to carry one bottle (of wine) to the millet (field).
#c 要帶一瓶(酒)去小米(田)裡面。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

free: #e (We) give the wine to ancestors first and tell them.
#c 祭酒, 先讓祖先喝(酒)告訴老人家。
#n katatamu為‘祭酒’, 是指用食指沾酒, 灑向周邊並說出祭詞。裡面的tamu除了祖先也包含眾靈
#n mo-’uruu-’uru ‘優先,在隊伍前頭, 起頭’, 即‘當第一個的意思’

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

free: #n mamia在這裡有請求意味：‘要了解’
#n mamia在這裡有請求意味：‘要了解’

meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

free: #e Oh Fathers! Please know, because we are your children you left.
#c 祖先阿! 要知道, 因為我們是你們僅留存的小孩(後代)。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu

#c 我們卡那卡那富人要收割小米了。

#c 從今天開始, 我們要收割小米了。

free: #e You elders’ words speak to us like this
#c 你們祖先所說的話, 這樣對我們說。

free: #e You, my children, after you have harvested the millet, saying: ‘you should go to the council hall to worship.
#c 你們,我的孩子們,你們收割小米之後, (交代)說: 你們應該要去聚會所祭祀。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

free: #e So the millet harvest you cannot do carelessly.
#c 所以收割小米(這件事)是不可以隨便的。
#n 此句的tavarʉ’ʉ非常簡化, ka’an的喉塞音也不明顯, 因此標為kaan

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

free: #e Like what Bunun said, we said doing things carelessly.
#c 就像布農族說的, 我們說隨便做做。
#n ka- = kamanʉʉng 製作, 做(通稱), 如做衣物, 土木等

#c 所以關於收割小米,有布農族所說的。

#c 布農族說骨頭是kireng kireng kireng。

free: #e We kanakanavu do not have that because we have never used bone at all.
#c 我們kanakanavu,沒有那樣,因為我們原本就不用骨頭。

free: #e We bring a bottle for the libation.
#c 我們祭酒會攜帶一個瓶子。

free: #e Oh! Fathers! I want to tell you.
#n tamu 包含所有過世的祖先

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

free: #e Today is the day of reaping the millet.
#c 今天是我們收割小米的日子。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

free: #e The words you ancestors tell us.
#c 關於你們祖先告訴我們的。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

free: #e At the time to harvest the millet.
#c 當要去收割小米的時候。

meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

free: #e We elders would say that at the time to harvest the millet, you should have already prepared the worshipping tools.
#c 我們老人家會這麼說: 當收割小米的時候,原本你們就要準備好你們要用來祭祀的東西。

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
meta.speaker: 翁坤, Mu'u, male, 1932-12-14

free: #n vanai ku tumatan si 我哭的原因是
#n vanai ku tumatan si [ (ni)-marivurau iikua cina]. 我哭的原因是媽媽打我

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu

free: #e Look, does Bunun hang on the lunch? No.
#c 看哪,布農族會懸掛午餐嗎? 沒有。
#n 族人會把吃不完剩下的飯用香蕉葉.姑婆芋葉包起來用芒草葉綁起懸掛在工寮代表保持豐盛,年年有餘,給周邊的精靈吃

#c 只有我們kanakanavu會做這個懸掛午餐的儀式。

#c 卡那卡那富什麼原因要把午餐懸掛，是要敬告在天上的祖先，啊！
